original_text: When they take you to stand in front of their leaders, do not be afraid. Do not worry about what you should say or how you should say it. At that time, God will give you the right words to speak.
korean_text: 너희를 넘겨 줄 때에 어떻게 또는 무엇을 말할까 염려하지 말라 그 때에 너희에게 할 말을 주시리니

sentences.original_text: When they take you to stand in front of their leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너를 이끌고 지도자들 앞에 세울 때에

sentences.original_text: Do not worry about what you should say
or how you should say it
sentences.korean_translation: 또 어떻게 말해야 할지 걱정하지 말라

sentences.original_text: God will give you the right words to speak
